entry.title: Compressed public keys
entry.summary: Pieter Wuille, a computer programmer, sent an email on November 21, 2011, asking for attention to a specific matter. He asked if all client implementations supported a particular thing, but did not specify what that thing was. To aid in testing this, he provided a link to an address that corresponds to a compressed public key. It is unclear what the purpose of this compressed public key is or how it relates to the matter that needs attention.
